entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then mainly cloudy. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 24.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Local blowing snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 24. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy late in the evening. Snow beginning overnight. Wind west 20 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning. Wind chill minus 37 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
